From: Internal News <ONE.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2024-11-05 17:01
Subject: Honouring UAE Flag Day, Bring Your Kids to Work Day, UAE Food Bank Recognises Our Group, Im Inclusive Annual Disability Inclusion Summit, SGII & JV Experience Hall, Tanagra Hosts Daum Artisan's Dinner & The Deal Single's Day Sale
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/XNQs-NNmUE66LQx9J182aQ/544502/4C7433AD8F37E0FA9D7A0F760761734E/top-banner-eng.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/XNQs-NNmUE66LQx9J182aQ/544527/EC71CDB837627227C5B1E3FED492ADBF/nuggets-05.png> 	

HONOURING UAE FLAG DAY

Our team members honoured UAE Flag Day across our offices with a history lesson, quiz and raising the flag!

The UAE flag is not just a symbol, but a symbol of the unity and perseverance that make this nation great.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/XNQs-NNmUE66LQx9J182aQ/550578/03C4BACF94DB60AC8F68B3E51FDE359F/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-32.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/XNQs-NNmUE66LQx9J182aQ/544909/0A6419EA29BB84DBA278AD6EE10C6BDE/nuggets-11.png> 	

OUR FIRST BRING YOUR KIDS TO WORK DAY!

chunks.text:
<https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/XNQs-NNmUE66LQx9J182aQ/550578/03C4BACF94DB60AC8F68B3E51FDE359F/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-32.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/XNQs-NNmUE66LQx9J182aQ/544909/0A6419EA29BB84DBA278AD6EE10C6BDE/nuggets-11.png> 	

OUR FIRST BRING YOUR KIDS TO WORK DAY!

If you heard laughter and the cheerful footsteps of little ones in the corridors last week, it was for a great reason! We hosted our very first Bring Your Kids to Work Day in the UAE (HO1 & d3). This reinforced our commitment to fostering a parent-friendly environment where families feel supported, welcomed and valued. 

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/XNQs-NNmUE66LQx9J182aQ/550579/E96B66E8E5AAEBB97F339696CD01260B/byktwd-recap-1.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/XNQs-NNmUE66LQx9J182aQ/544519/9F1D4F062DDE5CDDB676B07284D7F396/nuggets-17.png> 	

UAE FOOD BANK RECOGNISES OUR GROUP'S SUPPORT

The UAE Food Bank has recognised our efforts in supporting their initiatives for 2024, including the Ramadan "1 Million Meals" campaign. This highlights our commitment to supporting our community and ongoing contributions towards alleviating hunger and food insecurity. Thank you to all our volunteers!

chunks.text:
The UAE Food Bank has recognised our efforts in supporting their initiatives for 2024, including the Ramadan "1 Million Meals" campaign. This highlights our commitment to supporting our community and ongoing contributions towards alleviating hunger and food insecurity. Thank you to all our volunteers!

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/XNQs-NNmUE66LQx9J182aQ/550585/098C6F7ED24353D224A4B0EB4F588426/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-36.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/XNQs-NNmUE66LQx9J182aQ/545148/8302A5CDC9324E807612B07F8830E2DD/nuggets-19.png> 	

IM INCLUSIVE ANNUAL DISABILITY INCLUSION SUMMIT 2024

Our Talent Acquisition team was honored with the Rising Star and Inclusion-Driven HR & TA Teams awards—testaments to our ongoing dedication to Disability, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI). The event, gathered advocates, leaders, and allies, all united to drive accessibility and empowerment for people with disabilities.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/XNQs-NNmUE66LQx9J182aQ/550580/85FFE7B2D76D58529DB9DBD7CBBC7FA5/iminclusive-1-1.jpg> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/XNQs-NNmUE66LQx9J182aQ/545526/41B178D76F0AB97936155A9FC90A503A/nuggets-24.png> 	

SGII & JV EXPERIENCE HALL

chunks.text:
<https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/XNQs-NNmUE66LQx9J182aQ/550580/85FFE7B2D76D58529DB9DBD7CBBC7FA5/iminclusive-1-1.jpg> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/XNQs-NNmUE66LQx9J182aQ/545526/41B178D76F0AB97936155A9FC90A503A/nuggets-24.png> 	

SGII & JV EXPERIENCE HALL

SGII & JV Management hosted their bi-annual experience hall last week that included business updates from Ghawali, Dyson and our Investment team. As well as open conversations with the Founder of the “MindMe” wellbeing platform, Nokhez Usama and a look into exciting new projects in the works for the coming months.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/XNQs-NNmUE66LQx9J182aQ/550583/2064A1E438177318DDC02077C0E50694/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-34.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/XNQs-NNmUE66LQx9J182aQ/545122/532592ADCA76A26DF1DE256E516B3B3C/nuggets-53.png> 	

TANAGRA HOSTS DAUM ARTISAN'S DINNER

Tanagra hosted a dinner at the Theatre of Digital Arts to celebrate the new Daum collection. The event featured a 360 digital art experience with breathtaking ocean-inspired visuals and sounds. Guests also witnessed Daum’s meticulous craftsmanship as a live artisan unveiled an extraordinary piece by removing the plaster on-site.

Guests also witnessed Daum’s meticulous craftsmanship as a live artisan unveiled an extraordinary piece by removing the plaster on-site.

THE DEAL SINGLE'S DAY SALE

Don’t miss out on the up to 30% off Single’s Day Sale at The Deal from Nov 7 – Nov 13.

Offer available in-store and online. 

Happy shopping!

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/XNQs-NNmUE66LQx9J182aQ/550582/9AE99A82E64673940096DECEF12F182A/internal_singles-day_nl.gif>
